name: "Let's Go to the Hop" Trivia Game | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What country do all of the toads come from?
questions.explanation:
Colombia.

	All of the toads emerge from a crashed Colombian delivery plane.  The pilots had to evacuate the plane when lightning struck it.

questions.text: In the beginning of the episode, the Griffins are watching a commercial for what type of gum?
questions.explanation:
Doublefresh.

	The commercial features conjoined twins eating the gum together.  The commercial also makes Peter want to go to the circus.

questions.text: Who brings a toad into the house?
questions.explanation:
Meg.

	Meg was holding the toad to be popular.  Connie DeMico actually had the toad.  Lois figures out that Meg had the toad when she found a wart on Meg's hand.

questions.text: What is Peter and Lois' safety word?
questions.explanation:
Banana.

	Peter and Lois are becoming concerned about their kids and doing drugs because of the toad outbreak.

questions.text: What name does Peter use when he becomes a student at Meg's school?
questions.explanation:
Lando & Lando Griffin.

	Peter acts as a student to make sure that no one in the school uses the toad as a drug.  He sings a parody of "You're the One That I Want" from "Grease".

questions.text: Who sings in the "Give Up the Toad" song?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Brian says one small line during the song in a really low voice.  He's not even with the group singing the song.  Instead, he's at home on the couch reading the newspaper.

questions.text: Who wants to take Meg to the dance?
questions.explanation:
Neil & Neil Goldman.

	Neil is a total nerd and Meg tries to avoid him at all costs.  He soon becomes a recurring character and appears in later episodes.

questions.text: How many years younger than Peter is Lois?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	Eventually, we can learn how old Peter is, and we'll know how old Lois is.  Lois yells at Peter for dumping Meg to go to the prom with Connie DeMico.

questions.text: How does Peter kill off his high school self?
questions.explanation:
He fakes a motorcycle accident.

	Peter crashes a motorcycle and says that Lando Griffin dies.  The school is devastated and dedicates their yearbook to him.

questions.text: Were any of the Griffins' neighbours in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Again, none of the neighbours are in the episode.  Cleveland and Quagmire will appear in the next episode, but Joe won't appear for a few more.
